    Xinye Li

    CS undergraduate

    • Passion is the fuel in the fire of action.
    • Weihai, China
    • Email

    👋 Hi, everyone! I am a junior undergraduate student at Harbin Institute of Technology, China, currently working under the supervision of Prof. Dianbo Sui. My research interests lie in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Large Language Models (LLMs), with a particular focus on model editing and debiasing techniques.

    Previously, I was a competitive programming (CP) contestant and a leader of the ACM club, working under the guidance of Prof. Kaikun Dong.

    🔥 News

    • 2024.11:  🎉🎉 Our project “PCBGuard: An AI-Driven Innovative Industrial Quality Inspection Solution” was awarded the Second Prize in the Challenge Cup.

    • 2024.07:  🎉🎉 Our paper “Can We Debias Multimodal Large Language Models via Model Editing?” has been accepted by ACMMM 2024!

    • 2024.07: Personal Website is now live!

    📝 Publications

    ACMMM 2024 (CCF-A)

    Can We Debiase Multimodal Large Language Models via Model Editing?
    Zecheng Wang, Xinye Li, Zhanyue Qin, Chunshan Li, Zhiying Tu, Dianhui Chu, Dianbo Sui
